name: Cameron's Caverns
description:
Follow a group of friends (which are, quite literally, my own friends and I) on a terribly irreverent journey through a series of caves, which, by the way, are actually in a young man's anus. This, however, is never stated, but was the basis of the entire plot when it was first envisioned. It's trash. Please download.

Please report any bugs as this visual novel is still roughly a work-in-progress!
